title: Can't connect

embed.description: Grab seriously instant screenshots, screen GIFs, and webpage captures. Download the free app for Windows, Mac, browsers, and mobile to save what you see.

body:
I have attempted to restart my client four times, restarted my computer once and no matter what I do, it keeps returning "Trying To Reconnect"

My internet is running at its full speed, not a single problem anywhere else but on League. Is anyone else having the same problem?


Edit: 3 hours later I've managed to get 3 games in, mind you, usually missing the first 5 minutes because of the issue, but it's now worse than before. It'll log in for half a second, then instantly go to "Trying to Reconnect". I haven't had this issue at all prior to this patch but it's ridiculous. Literally unplayable at the moment.

replies.body:
Sorry for the late response- it seems like there were login issues around this time, which were subsequently addressed in this post:

> [{quoted}](name=Gehirn,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=1EiLQpcO,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-06-28T01:06:11.786+0000)
>
> Hi everyone, we've reverted a change that may have caused this and it is looking like you should be able to log in again now. Still trying to gather more info about why this change caused this issue for some players. OCE was not the only region impacted.

If you encounter login issues in the future, 

* Check out the [Service Status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#oce) page
* If there is no login service downtime, try the solutions in the [Login Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944-Login-Issues) Riot Support article

Thanks for the report, and sorry again for the late reply.
I just tried now mine doesn't work
Exact same issue here - Only occuring after the release of the skin event. Repaired client to no avail.
